Posts.Content: I have surgery in two weeks and I am getting both breasts removed..I took chemo first too and anxious for the surgery..It's like you're ready to move to the next phase because you know you're just that much closer to winning the battle...but it's so hard..I too wondering about the emotional baggage I will carrying knowing I have no breast and have to travel the reconstruction road..but I wish you well my sister.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy is my only option

Posts.Content: Oh I understand and can definitely relate :(
Posts.Title: Because some things aren't suitable for Facebook...
